bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of the three evil qi feng 風 , wind, han 寒 , cold, and shi 濕 , moisture, that together may cause a disease. Su wen 素問 43: 六腑亦各有俞，風寒濕氣中其俞， 而食飲應之 , 循俞而入，各舍其腑也 , “Of the six palaces, too, each has its [respective] transporters. When wind , cold , and moisture qi strike these transporters and if food and beverages correspond to them, they enter via the transporters and each [qi] lodges in its respective palace”.
